summary: THE VEHICLE LOST ALL POWER WHILE I WAS DRIVING ON A FREEWAY. THE POWER CAME BACK ON, (SHOWING CERTAIN FEATURES BUT NOT ALL) BRIEFLY FOR A MINUTE AND THEN SHUT DOWN AGAIN.  IN ADDITION TO THIS PROBLEM, A CONSISTENT ISSUE THAT HAS HAPPENED NO LESS THAN 6 TIMES OVER THE COURSE OF A YEAR IS THE VEHICLE INTERPRETS THERE IS SOMETHING IN ITS PATH AND SLAMS ON THE BRAKES WHEN THERE IS NOTHING IN ITS PATH. THERE IS NO CAR, PERSON, OBJECT, PLANT, ETC. IN THE WAY OF THE VEHICLE AT ALL.
